sentences.content: Dredging and dumping at sea activities have been well regulated by Contracting Parties since the Osl...
Convention came into force in 1974, and then through the OSPAR Convention which came into force
Since the implementation of the original OSPAR guidelines in 1998, loads of contaminants
Dredged material management is a common and necessary practice within the OSPAR Maritime Area.
Management of dredged material is well regulated by OSPAR measures and the related national
Together with European Union and national regulations, OSPAR measures have led to a reduction in
OSPAR. 2003. An Overall Assessment of the Dumping of Wastes at Sea from the mid-1980's to 2001
in the OSPAR Area. Available at:
